Day 1: After a level 77 breakfast on the observation deck at SkyPoint, head to Mount Tamborine for local artisan shopping, the Skywalk or cheese tasting at Witches Chase. Be surrounded by songbirds during a tranquil rainforest lunch then take a brewery tour at the Carlton Brewhouse before heading to dinner and a show at Jupiters.

Day 2: After breakfast with the locals at a surf club, meet the surf lifesavers and learn to surf or play volleyball or any other team activity. For lunch you’ll relax at the Tweed River and feast on Singapore Chilli Crab and local wine before discovering more than 500 varieties of tropical fruit at Tropical Fruit World. Tonight, it’s Dracula’s Cabaret Show, a three course meal full of surprises.

Day 3: After breakfast at Sea World’s Dolphin Cove, a celebrity chef will take you on a team cooking challenge and you can savour your work with lunch at the Gold Coast Turf Club. That afternoon, shop with a stylist or simply go on a shopping spree at Robina Town Centre, before a unique dinner and show with over 40 stock horses and a three course Australian outback dinner.

Day 4: After breakfast at Dreamworld on Tiger Island with the Bengal Tigers, play a round of golf at one of many championship courses or indulge in a luxury spa treatment. After lunch at Marina Mirage or Tedder Avenue head to the Southport Yacht Club for an afternoon of sailing on the Broadwater. That evening, it’s all style, with a night to remember at Palazzo Versace.

Day 5: Take an early morning ride on a Harley Davidson to Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary then take on your choice of activity for the morning: either a tour of the Currumbin Wildlife Hospital or taking to the high ropes of the Green Challenge. After a seafood buffet lunch, take a Balunjali Tour - a kayaking trip to see the Gold Coast through the eyes of local Aboriginal people. Finish the day watching the sunset with exclusive use of McLaren’s Landing and an Aussie BBQ dinner.
